tech_specs: Both with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish
Hood, yoke and collar: 4.4-oz 100% recycled nylon plain weave with a PU coating and a DWR (durable water repellent) finish
Pocket bags (palm side): 3.8-oz 100% polyester brushed tricot
Insulation: 600-fill-power 100% Recycled Down (duck and goose down reclaimed from down products)
